description: Module for setup of Network Avi RESTful Object

username.description: Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

vrf_context_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type vrfcontext.

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

exclude_discovered_subnets.description: When selected, excludes all discovered subnets in this network from consideration for virtual service placement. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

vimgrnw_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type vimgrnwruntime.

cloud_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type cloud.

api_version.description: Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

tenant_ref.description: It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

state.description: The state that should be applied on the entity.

synced_from_se.description: Boolean flag to set synced_from_se. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

dhcp_enabled.description: Select the ip address management scheme for this network. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

url.description: Avi controller URL of the object.

controller.description: IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

vcenter_dvs.description: Boolean flag to set vcenter_dvs. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

password.description: Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

tenant_uuid.description: UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

tenant.description: Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
